rows.Description:
Adding a resource
parameters:
  • path - Path for the resource in registry. (resource path)
  • resource - this is the json object which contains all data related to the resource which will be created. 
      • var path ='/_system/config/wso2/sample'; 
      var resource ={ 
	content: 'This is a sample text.', 
	mediaType: 'text/plain', 
	description: 'This is a sample description', 
	uuid: '0123', 
		properties:{prop1: 'val1', prop2: 'val2'}
	};
      content - content of the resource.
      mediaType - type of the resourceâ€™s content
      description - a description about the resource.
      uuid -
      properties - properties of the resource. This is a json object which contains property name and its value.

Adding a collection
Collection is also a resource which contains set of resources. So we can use put method as above to add a collection.
parameters:
  • path - Path for the resource in registry. (resource path)
  • collection - this is the json object which contains all data related to the collction which will be created. 
      • var path ='/_system/config/wso2/sample'; 
      var resource ={ 
	collection: true,
	description: 'This is a sample description', 
	uuid: '0123', 
		properties:{prop1: 'val1', prop2: 'val2'}
	};
      collection - boolean value to identify the resource as a collection.
      description - a description about the resource.
      uuid -
      properties - properties of the resource. This is a json object which contains property name and its value.

Retrieving a resource
We can retrieve a resource to jaggery as a json object which contains all data about the resource.
parameters:
  • path - Path for the resource in registry. (resource path)
      • var path ='/_system/config/wso2/sample'; 
      var       resource = registry.get(path)

Moving a resource:
We can move a resource to a new location in registry.
parameters:
  • src - Current location(path) of the resource.
  • dest - Destination location(path) of the resource. 
      • var src ='/_system/config/wso2/sample'; 
      var dest ='/_system/config/wso2/dest/sample';

Copping a resource:
We can copy a resource to a new location in registry.
parameters:
  • src - Current location(path) of the resource.
  • dest - Destination location(path) of the resource. 
      • var src ='/_system/config/wso2/sample'; 
      var dest ='/_system/config/wso2/dest/sample';

Copping a resource:
We can copy a resource to a new location in registry.
parameters:
  • src - Current location(path) of the resource.
  • dest - Destination location(path) of the resource. 
      • var src ='/_system/config/wso2/sample'; 
      var dest ='/_system/config/wso2/dest/sample';
